description:
These all-mountain boots will underwrite your quest for touring fit and performance. The S/Lab Mtn Ski Boots hike up like light touring boots and ski down like nimble downhill chargers. With 47 degrees of motion, they feel easy and natural on a long hike up. Thermoformable liners tune the fit with precision, and the shells are light enough to encourage you to climb high into the alpine for an epic top to bottom line.

  • Grilamid+ lower shell with an Pebax cuff
  • Custom Shell HD is heat-mouldable to provide the best fit possible
  • Carbon fibre spine is rigid to allow a wide range of motion and forward flex
  • Motion Flex Technology offers 47 degrees of motion
  • 24mm riveted oversized pivot reduces play for precision and direct power transmission
  • Textile cover on lower tongue saves weight and adds comfort in walk mode
  • My Customfit 3D Freeride liner is ultralight and thermoformable
  • Surelock ski/walk mechanism has metal on metal locking system for reliable support
  • 2 buckles and a cam-actuated booster strap provide a precise fit
  • Contagrip sole provides grip and the rockered sole allows a natural walking motion
name: Salomon S/Lab Mtn Boots - Unisex
